channel.title: HKG:3908 on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Banker Talent War Spurs CICC to Use New Paths for Promotion
item.description: China International Capital Corp. has created new layers of job titles for senior investment bankers, according to people familiar with the matter, as it tries to retain talent amid a boom in dealmaki
